text: Bright Victory is a 1951 American World War II romantic drama movie. It was directed by Mark Robson. The movie is based on the 1945 book Lights Out by Baynard Kendrick. Actors include Arthur Kennedy, Peggy Dow, Julie Adams, Will Geer, Richard Egan, Rock Hudson, and John Hudson. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. It was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1952. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1951 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Mark Robson
title: Bright Victory
